about_the_game:
Folklore Three: The Little Devil

A young daughter named Putri needs to pay her father’s medical bills. Remembering that she has an inheritance from her unknown grandfather, she decides to pawn all valuable items there as a way to get quick money. While she tries to find treasure inside the supposed-to-be empty mansion, Putri uncovers long lost secrets and a creepy additional inheritance that tore her family apart. Along the way, Putri must choose which path she wants to embark in order to be content with her life.

A Javanese-Dutch Colonial Contemporary Mansion

Explore the vast setting of a Javanese fused with Dutch colonial contemporary architecture and a spine-chilling atmosphere. Look deeper as you learn about what you should and shouldn't do inside a house. Be prepared to reveal all the hidden mysteries behind the walls of the mansion.

Solve Puzzles and Get Your Inheritance

Experience Putri’s struggles as she juggles between many goals; wishing to save her father, saying goodbye to poverty, or revealing the mysteries of her family. Learn how to prioritize which treasures you think is the most valuable or what kind of help you can employ. Make sure that you’re the only one preying for your grandfather’s wealth. Solve the puzzles scattered and hidden throughout the house to get your hands on to the treasures. The choices are yours.

Be Careful While Choosing

The decisions you make in the game will lead you to different routes and endings in order to give you different experiences in each and every gameplay. As you play the game, you can choose to run away from the very beginning or continue the game with various conditions to end the game. You can choose to be a responsible daughter, be a greedy one, or being rude towards your surroundings. Just imagine, if you were in that situation, what would you do? Just remember. be careful so that you won’t regret your own doings.

•    Fantasy Violence - Violent actions of a fantasy nature, involving human or non-human characters in situations easily distinguishable from real life
•    Intense Violence - Graphic and realistic-looking depictions of physical conflict. May involve extreme and/or realistic blood, gore, weapons and depictions of human injury and death
•    Language - Mild to moderate use of profanity
•    Strong Language - Explicit and/or frequent use of profanity
•    Tobacco Reference - Reference to and/or images of tobacco products
•    Drug Use - References to the use of medication drugs.
